title: Bug 2529 - Navigator: Open/Close project not always available
description: Bug 2529 - Navigator: Open/Close project not always available. When two projects, P1 and P2, are selected, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project is not available.
OB: When selecting both projects P1 and P2, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project menu item is not.
EB: When selecting both projects P1 and P2, both the Open Project and Close Project menu items should be available.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create two projects, P1 and P2. 
2. Select P2. 
3. Attempt to close P2 by navigating to the Close Project menu item.
